channel.title: Feature Update on AlteredAdmin
channel.description: Recent content in Feature Update on AlteredAdmin

item.title: Feature Update Windows 10 Using SCCM Application Model
item.description: This is not officially support by Microsoft Your probably wondering, why would you deploy windows 10 using the application model? why not use the feature update in SCCM? Well that would worked for still in service versions of windows 10 however if you are running an older version of windows 10, and deploy this feature update, SCCM can mark it as compliant and never install the Feature update. like wise why not use the upgrade task sequence?
